name: Algorithms
responsibilities: -Convert apoapsis and periapsis distance to astronomical units
-Calculate the semi-major axis of a planet's ellipse
-Calculate the eccentricity of a planet's ellipse
-Calculate the period of a planet
-Calculate the average velocity of a planet
-Calculate the velocity of a planet at a certain point
-Calculate the semi-minor axis of a planet
-Create the path transition that the planet will follow
-Calculate the center X coordinate for an ellipse given a BorderPane
-Calculate the center Y coordinate for an ellipse given a BorderPane
-Create a sphere based off of the radius of a planet
-Create an ellipse path of a planet
-Conversion for coordinate of semi-major axis
-Conversion for apoapsis distance in coordinates

name: Constants
responsibilities: Hold the following constants for each planet in our solar system:
-Mass
-Planet radius
-Periapsis distance from sun
-Apoapsis distance from sun
-Inclination
-Wrapper image for planet
-The rate (-1 or 1) to determine how the planet traverses its orbit

name: JavaFXMain
responsibilities: -Create scene for gui
-Set background image for gui
-Create planet instances for each planet within our solar system
-Create Sun instance for the sun within our solar system
-Set wrapper images for each planet and sun
-Add sun and planet instances to SolarSystem instance
-Creates light source on sun
-If up hit on keyboard, zoom in
-If down hit on keyboard, zoom out
-If A hit on keyboard, translate to the left
-If D hit on keyboard, translate to the right
-If S hit on keyboard, translate down
-If W hit on keyboard, translate up
-If Space hit on keyboard, center pane on sun again

name: Moon
responsibilities: All of the same responsibilities as planet

name: Sun
responsibilities: Same as planet

name: Planet
responsibilities: Hold and obtaining the following information:
-Period of planet
-semi-minor axis of planet's orbit
-Planet's average distance from the sun
-Planet's inclination
-Eccentricity of planet's orbit
-Radius of the planet
-Mass of the planet
-Name of the planet
-Apoapsis distance from the sun
-Periapsis distance from the sun
-Semi-major axis of the planet's orbit
-Average velocity of the planet
-Path of the ellipse that the planet will follow
-The path transition that the planet will follow
-The rate and direction at which the planet orbits the sun

name: SolarSystem
responsibilities: Add planet classes to array of of solar system
Be able to select a certain planet within the solar system
Be able to get the size of the planets within the solar system
Put all of the planets within the solar system to the BorderPane that is given
